	Since you clicked the "Help" setting we are assuming you are having doubts while using FlexiPDF app.
 Therefore, the following paragraphs will concisely explain to you how to use this app.
 
 	1.	 "Home" 
 As soon as you open the app you will find this interface. You will be faced with two word lines "Recents" and "Favourites" and a message signaling the set language will appear on your screen. 
Using the bar below you will be able to navigate the different functionalities of this app.
 
 	2.	 "Folders"
 If this is the first time you are using this app, then you will find an empty view, with a search bar and a floating action button. Currently the searchbar would be useless considering that you haven't yet uploaded any file or created a folder. To do that you can click on the red button on the right part of your screen. A small interface will appear in which you will be able to decide whether to "Create new folder" or to "Import a PDF file". 
 Depending on your choice you will be faced with two different screens: 
 			->	 If you clicked "Create new folder" you will be asked to provide a name and by clicking on the 'Create' button your folder will appear on your screen, otherwise if the name you provided is empty an error message will be shown and the folder won't be created at all.
 			->	 If you clicked "Import a PDF file" then you will be asked to choose a file to import and by clicking on the 'Import' button it will be automatically shown on the screen.
 Using the searchbar above you can search your way onto the imported files and created folders. For deleting, moving and setting as favourite a certain imported file you can firmly click and the file will start vibrating. On the upper part of your screen you will see the above mentioned functionalities.
 
 	3.	 "Shared"
 This part of the app isn't functional, since it misses the cloud connection part. 
 
 	4.	 "Settings"
 Well, you made it to the end. Here you can change in app language clicking on the so called functionality and choosing between the different languages available in the app (only three are supported: English, Italian and German).
 "Theme" gives you the possibility to change the app colors from light to dark.
 "Help" is the functionality you have chosen now that provides information about the app.
 "Share" gives the possibility to share the app with your friends.
